amendment.description: To prohibit States from providing the Secretary with reports containing personally identifiable information.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2821 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2821 proposed by Senator Burr for Senator Lee.
